pages.text: The shotgun is the main weapon for the medical class and provides a unique experience.$(br)Currently this is the only weapon that fires more than one projectile per shot, each projectile is spaced 1 block apart to help with the spread.$(br)
The specs of the shotgun are.$(br)$(li1)Range: Low,$(li1)Speed: 1.2 Seconds,$(li1)Projectiles: 3.$(br)
